titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Collegiat [sic] Church of S. Peter in Westminster, on the 27 of March, being the day of His Majesties inauguration by Thomas Fuller.
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

notesStmt.note: The first of two editions published in the same year. Described in Oxford bibliographical society, Proceedings & papers, vol. 4, p. 103.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
